0: For a target, place, etc., to be specified and fixed.
To specially select and hire someone.
To identify and decide the characteristics of a certain object.

1: 다른 것에 비하여 특별히 눈에 뜨이는 표적이 되다.

0: To get to have more time to do something.
To become very different from what is normal.
To send someone on special assignment.

1: 어떤 물체가 반듯하고 곧바르지 아니하고 옆으로 굽거나 꼬이다.

0: For something to become bent or twisted, to no longer be square or straight.
For an intended task to be made difficult or to go wrong.
For someone or something to be turned o a certain direction, that is not the original direction.
For two people in a relationship to grow apart.
To capture the right time for something or make the most of a chance.

1: 무엇을 어떤 곳에 아무렇게나 오래 넣어 두다.

0: To thrust and push something into a small space effortfully.
To keep something in a certain place for a long period.
To hold something in one’s hands tightly.
To have absolute control over something.

1: 셈이나 사실 따위가 그르게 되거나 어긋나다.
바라거나 하려는 일이 순조롭게 되지 못하다.
마음이나 행동 따위가 올바르지 못하고 비뚤어지다.
For a calculation, answer, fact, etc., to not be correct.
For something hoped for or intended to go wrong.
For one's mind or behavior to be extremely twisted, not upright.
2: For a whole or a part of one's body to be turned around to a direction different from way one is facing.
For a screw, faucet, knob, etc., to be turned or wound.
For one's emotion, psychological state, etc., to become worse.
For a relationship with someone to become bad.

0: For someone to be sent on special assignment.

1: 억지로 들이밀어 넣어 통하지 못하게 하다.
잘못된 일이 드러나지 아니하도록 억지로 막다.

0: To prevent flow along a passage by thrusting something into it.
To intentionally prevent a fault from being known.

1: 신문 따위의 출판물에서 어떤 기사에 큰 비중을 두어 다루다. 특별히 두드러지게 보이도록 글자를 크게 쓴다는 뜻에서 나온 말이다.

0: be specially employed; be specially appointed
For someone to be specially selected and hired.

1: 세속(世俗)에 따르지 않고 스스로 믿는 바를 행하다.
자신의 의도대로 움직이도록 손안에 완전히 들게 하다.

0: To hold something in one’s hand tightly.
To make someone do as one wants him/her to do.
To push something into a small space effortfully.

1: 짚이나 대 따위로 엮어서 보금자리, 둥지, 멍석 따위를 만들다.
뱀 따위가 몸을 둥글게 말아 똬리처럼 만들다.
몸을 움직여 어떤 모양이나 자세를 만들다.

0: To twist and turn one’s body or part of one’s body in another direction.
To turn a screw, faucet, knob, etc.
To operate a device such as a water tap, making water run.
To operate a machine or device.
To operate a certain device, making a sound heard or image seen.
To cause something which has proceeded well to become difficult or go wrong.
To make one's hair into a mass and raise it on the top of one’s head with a topknot, chignon, etc.
To make a cottage, nest, straw mat, etc., by weaving it with straw, bamboo strips, etc.
To spread cotton using a willowing machine.
For a snake to coil its body in circles.
To make a pose by moving one’s body.
To turn an object moving in a certain direction to another direction.

1: 먹은 음식이 위에서 잘 소화되지 아니하여서 생긴 가스가 입으로 복받쳐 나오다.

0: For the gas created by food that has not digested well in one's stomach to come out through one's mouth.

1: 막혀 있던 것이 치워지고 통하게 되다. ‘트다02[1]「1」’의 피동사.
막혀 있던 운 따위가 열려 좋은 상태가 되다.
마음이나 가슴이 답답한 상태에서 벗어나게 되다.
생각이나 지적 능력이 낮은 수준이나 정도에서 상당한 수준이나 정도에 이르게 되다.
막혀 제대로 나오지 아니하던 목소리가 나오다.

0: For something that has been closed or blocked to be cleared and become passable.
For a market, etc., to be open.
For a business relationship or network to form.
For bad luck to pass, improving one's situation.
For one's mind or emotion to get over a worry or trouble.
For one's thought or intelligence to reach a substantially high level from a low level.
For a voice hardly heard due to a sore throat, etc., to be heard again.

1: 밖에 나가지 않고 일정한 공간에만 머물러 있다.
특정한 지역이나 외지(外地)에서 나오지 아니하고 그곳에서만 지내다.
비좁은 자리에 억지로 쑤셔지고 들이밀리다. ‘틀어박다「1」’의 피동사.
무엇이 어떤 곳에 아무렇게나 오래 넣어 두어지다. ‘틀어박다「2」’의 피동사.

0: To stay in a certain place, not going outside.
To stay in a certain region only, not leaving the region.
be squeezed; be crammed; be stuffed
For something to be thrust and pushed into a small space with a great effort.
For something to be kept in a certain place for a long period.

1: 일반적이고 보편적인 것과 다르게 되다. 또는 그렇게 되게 하다.

0: To become very different from what is normal, or to change something that way.

1: 다른 것에 비하여 특별히 눈에 뜨이는 표적이 되다. 또는 그렇게 만들다.
종합 병원에서 환자의 요청에 따라 특정한 의사가 진료하다.
At a hospital, for a specific doctor to treat a patient on request.
2: For one's title or level to rise specially, in recognition of one's excellent service.

1: 너무 마르거나 춥거나 하여 틈이 생겨서 갈라지다.
식물의 싹, 움, 순 따위가 벌어지다.
더 기대할 것이 없는 상태가 되다.
2: 막혀 있던 것을 치우고 통하게 하다.

1: To form gaps and to be cracked because it is too dry or cold.
For a sprout, shoot, etc., of a plant to come out or open up.
For the eastern sky to become bright as the morning comes.
To reach a state in which one can expect nothing.
2: To remove blocking objects and make the part passable.
To start a friendship with someone, neither mutually cautious nor shy.
To form a relationship with someone with whom one trades things mutually.
To become close to someone and to be able to speak casually.

1: To specifically point out and clearly designate.

0: To treat and record something specially.
